item.title: swagger接口测试
item.description: import json import random import string import requests requests.packages.urllib3.disable_warnings() session = requests.Session() session.trust_env = False def load_swagger_json(file_path): with open(file_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as file: swagger_data = json.load(file) return swagger_data def extract_endpoints(swagger_data): paths = swagger_data.get('paths', {}) endpoints = [] for path, methods in paths.items(): for method, details in methods.items(): endpoint = { 'path': path, 'method': method.upper(), 'operationId': details.get('operationId', ''), 'parameters': details.get('parameters', []) } endpoints.append(endpoint) return endpoints def replace_path_parameters(path, parameters): for param in parameters: if param['in'] == 'path': path = path.
